root.name: Picotto Knights
root.description: OverviewPicotto Knights was a free to play online fantasy brawler developed by Game Arts for the PlayStation Vita. It was released in Japan on September 20, 2012, and was due to be released in Europe and North America by GungHo early the next year. The release never happened however, and the game was ultimately discontinued in Japan on October 31, 2013.
